name: Dungeon Scramble
description:
A wizard cursed you and your friends to switch bodies every so often. In order to revert the curse you must defeat him.

Your characters switch every level. Your current character is shown in the icon.

Controls (to move, attack):

Player 1: WASD, Q

Player 2: Arrow Keys, ?

Player 3: UHJK, Y

Player 4: 8456, 0 (number pad)
